required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: A Single-Center, Single-Dose, Randomized, Open-Label, Parallel Study of Relative Bioavailability With Oral Administration of New and Old Formulations of SHR3680 Tablets in Healthy Male Subjects Under Fasting Conditions

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-center, single-dose, randomized, open-label, parallel sstudy to evaluate the relative bioavailability of new and old formulations of SHR3680 tablets in healthy male subjects under fasting conditions.

primary_outcome.time_frame: predose, and 0.5, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 12, 24, 48, 72, 96, 168 and 336 hour after dosing

secondary_outcome.measure: The incidence and severity of adverse events/serious adverse events (based on NCI-CTCAE 5.0)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From the screening to the scheduled last visit day (Day 49±1 after dosing)

intervention.description: Subjects receiving a single oral dose of SHR3680 tablets with 240mg (80mg*3)
subjects receiving a single oral dose of SHR3680 tablets with 240mg (100mg*2+20mg*2).

facility.name: The Second Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University
